description: I didn´t like this guy at the beginning. I expect some degree of politeness from the applicants and he had almost none. He unsuccessfully tried to lie about his language skills and was very rude at me when I told him about our mediation fee. Even though I did my best to find this spoiled dude the best job he could ever qualify for! After 10 minutes of talking, I hated the guy. He refused to take his clothes off so I told him to get out. I was so fed up with him! The boy left the office and then came back! He apologized and accepted my offer. His lean and young body was only a small consolation. I was still angry and I wanted to get it out of my system. I paid him to become my whore and he reluctantly agreed. I was going to fuck the guy´s ass very hard. That should teach him manners!
title: Dirty Scout 147
